update Reissue
memID = #{memid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
reiTime = #{reitime,jdbcType=DATE},
reiOldNum = #{reioldnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
reiNewNum = #{reinewnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
reiReason = #{reireason,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where reiID = #{reiid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update Reissue set memID = #{memid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, reiTime = #{reitime,jdbcType=DATE}, reiOldNum = #{reioldnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, reiNewNum = #{reinewnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, reiReason = #{reireason,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where reiID = #{reiid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
